text: @ChristinaKTLA @GavinNewsom Excellent point. All the BLM and ANTIFA protests going on around the country is probably contributing to the rise in the number of coronavirus cases. Medical personnel should refuse medical attention to these idiots that are not wearing masks or practicing social distancing.
